Commons.reset-data-description: Clear all your planner data, courses, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
Commons.reset-data-warning: This will delete all your data permanently!

Onboarding.program-step-description: Let's get started by selecting your program
Onboarding.program-description: Select the program you are enrolled in. This will help us show you relevant courses.
Onboarding.session-step-description: Tell us when you started your program

PlannerPage.no-course-modif-past-session: No changes allowed for this past session.
PlannerPage.drag-courses-to-add-course: Drag courses here to add them to this session.
PlannerPage.courses-availability-not-yet-published: Information on course availability for this session is not yet published by the school.
PlannerPage.no-courses-found-global: No courses found in any program. Try a different search term.
PlannerPage.session-not-created: Session {session} is not yet created. Please add the year first.
